channel.title: Rules

item.title: Rules
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

I’ve said it before, and I’ll say it again. Creating threads to complain about a staff member is strictly forbidden. Speak with an administrator if you do not like what the staff are doing.

Edit: Additionally, if you have a complaint to make about a rule, pm a staff member, don’t post a thread for public support.

Read full topic

item.title: Rules
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Rangers_Apprentice, post:8, topic:254707”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=336566.msg2615471#msg2615471 date=1231003927]
Shut-up complaining about elitists, we don’t give a shit if you feel left out of the circle. The staff are friends with them, and that’s how it will stay (although despite this they still get punished and banned from time to time).

You’re trying to bring up a point that countless others have, funny thing is, it’s full of bullshit because certain incorruptible staff cough Lothy cough keeps shit in order.

Looking at your previous posts you’re just another newfag whose upset because he doesn’t roll with the bigboys.
[/quote]

There is you example of corruption m8. This bastard. :)[/quote]
greeny isnt corrupt hes just cool

Read full topic

item.title: Rules
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

Just like in real life, you got the “bigboys”, the less respected and the non respected.
Corruption is everywhere, so learn to deal with it.

I made a thread wich i told that this forum is in need for a change, but i realised i was wrong.
I like this forum, the immaturity of some people is what brings me back here.

Read full topic

Always nice to know you’re thinking of me.

item.title: Rules
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Welcome to thead #905843509735 stating this, this week.

You can state it all you like, it dosen’t make it less BS. Personally, I don’t look at who’s posted something when I read the forums, until after I’ve read it and taken moderation if nessecary. I’ve muted/moderated my friends tons of times and not realised who it was until they bitch at me on msn. If anyone would like to point out examples of this corruption instead of just repeating what Greeny says, go ahead.

EDIT: That was weird, I mentioned Greeny completely off the cuff and he posted here just before me… ohai

Read full topic

item.title: Rules
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

I am not the “typical” people as I hardly reply to any threads here, but the staff are enforcing the rules if you would you around harder. Idiots on these forums complain how the moderators and admins are enforcing too much and now are saying they aren’t enforcing enough, they are in a fight they can’t win. Moparisthebest recently finished his exams so he will be working on the forum more now, the other moderators are doing there job so this thread is useless.

Read full topic

item.title: Rules

item.description:
@Rangers_Apprentice wrote:

“Look at the rules here or you may be sorry”

I’d like to point out that the above is typical bullshit - just like most things on this forum. None of the rules are followed, and the staff never enforces. This forum definitely needs a lot of work…
